column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First of all
column2: I have to admit that I am not a fan of carbs
column3: but when it comes to pastries from CB
column4: I will DEVOUR anything they have!  Not only are the pastries divine
column5: their brunch and lunch are just as amazing. The chicken torta is extremely moist and it literally melts in your mouth.  It's a must!  The line is usually out the door but if you time it correctly
column6: it's tolerable!  Don't leave without at least 2 chocolate chip walnut cookies! Bigger than your palm!
